dmca.title: Ticket ID# XKU-448703
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Jayme Williams [mailto:jayme@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Monday, June 05, 2006 10:33 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Ticket ID# XKU-448703
Subject: RE: Ticket ID# XKU-448703


To whom it may concern

 

Please accept the attached as a notice of retraction referencing
maccar.com and Sony Mobile. Please close all cases reagrding maccar.com
and Sony mobile and take no further action. 

 

Sincerely, 

 

Jayme W
LMS Representative
Jayme@netenforcers.com 

 

<mailto:copyright@theplanet.com> 

________________________________

From: Mac Car Motorsports [mailto:maccar1996@yahoo.com]
Sent: Fri 6/2/2006 6:17 PM
To: Jayme Williams
Subject: Ticket ID# XKU-448703

To whom it may concern:

 

My website has been suspend today.  We are an authorized Sony Mobile
dealer.  I contacted my rep today.  Per our sales rep said that is fine
for me to have Sony Logo on our website but no shopping cart.  I will
remove the items from our shopping cart today.  Please contact my server
to remove the complaint. So I can do some changes.  Please contact me
ASAP.  Thank you.

 

Tina Wu

Mac Car Stereo

Tel: (626) 961-7899

www.maccar.com <http://www.maccar.com/> 

tina@maccar.com

 

Mac Car Motorsports 
15138 Valley Blvd. City of Industry, CA 91746 
Tel: (626) 961-7899

__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around 
http://mail.yahoo.com 



---Attached---

Designated Agent
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway 
Suite 110 
Dallas TX 75207 

Re: Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property : maccar.com/Sony Mobile 

To Whom It May Concern:

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent referencing www.maccar.com and our client Sony Mobile.  It was brought to our attention that www.maccar.com is an authorized internet dealer of Sony Mobile and is therefore authorized to use the trademark logos and copyrighted images and they have made the necessary corrections to their website to comply with our request. Please accept this letter as a notice of retraction and all cases concerning www.maccar.com and Sony Sony Mobile can be closed. 

Sincerely, 

Jayme W
LMS Department Representative
Net Enforcers, Inc. 
Jayme@netenforcers.com 
Compliance.Management@netenforcers.com
